title: [Large-Scale] Math Project Design Course for Preparing Web-Based Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners solve real-life problems through mathematical modeling projects and engage in self-directed learning via a web-based learning system

learning_goals: Learners can plan math projects with over 80% self-directedness using a web-based system over 14 weeks
Learners can revise problem-solving strategies three or more times using peer feedback and system resources during project implementation
Learners can achieve a 0.5 or greater improvement in self-directed learning readiness (logits scale) from pre- to post-assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
